versions.name: Initial version
versions.summary: The follow up headset to the Meta Quest 2. This headset is slimmer, and sports a new graphics chip claiming double the performance, and also has a higher resolution screen. The Meta Quest 3 has an increased focus on mixed reality, with an improved passthrough view.
